channel.title: Posts on Mixed thoughts on Software

item.title: Design by Contract supported by tests
item.description: In this post I’m going to describe a testing technique that lays a foundation for an alternative to stubbing that I often find superior. Contract test’s can be applied to all levels of testing, but in this post im going to describe them in the context of unit testing where i personally often use them to define and verify the behavior of an API. The concept of a Contract Test is not new.
